name: Reza Madabadi
title: Why Your Database Hates You: The N+1 Query Problem
description: Ever faced a surge in CPU usage and an avalanche of database queries during nightly imports? It saves $$$ In this talk, I will talk about N+1 issue: - What is it ? - What are the impacts ? - How to detect it ? - How to perform fixes. Temporary & permanent. Backed with data and some code :)
